sentences: "Hatsu Shitsuren" (初失恋) – Mos Burger TV commercial song
"Hatsu Shitsuren" (初失恋) – Mos Burger TV commercial song
Mini Album: miwa NOEL (November 27, 2008 – Sold Out)
She was the host of All Night Nippon when the 2004 Chūetsu earthquake occurred.
She sang 3 songs from INORAN's first album "Sou" (「想」) and her own song "Koorizatou" (「氷砂糖」), which was produced by INORAN and H. Hayama, as well as two unreleased songs.
